metadata.title: CVE-2016-2119

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP1

metadata.description: libcli/smb/smbXcli_base.c in Samba 4.x before 4.2.14, 4.3.x before 4.3.11, and 4.4.x before 4.4.5 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to bypass a client-signing protection mechanism, and consequently spoof SMB2 and SMB3 servers, via the (1) SMB2_SESSION_FLAG_IS_GUEST or (2) SMB2_SESSION_FLAG_IS_NULL flag.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12-LTSS is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP1 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP4 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP5 is installed
